channel.title: Autospawn.cfg Monsters hit only up to 3
channel.description: I changed quite a few autospawn.cfg monsters' levels and hp in the npc.cfg file, yet they don't really hit that high. Level 157's shouldn't hit 2's... So, any assistance with this? I'd like to be able to change what each monster can hit individually, if possible.

item.title: Autospawn.cfg Monsters hit only up to 3
item.dc:creator: @twinky12341 twinky12341
item.description:
@twinky12341 wrote:

raped delta is a GOOD source if you know a good way to code it.

::ontopic

you need to make npc agresivness for it to work better and hit high changing there combat lvls does not do anything. just makes people more afraid of it…

i actually do not know to change npc agressive ness i saw a tut on it when i get the link i will post it.

Read full topic
item.source: Autospawn.cfg Monsters hit only up to 3

item.title: Autospawn.cfg Monsters hit only up to 3
item.dc:creator: @raped_by_who raped by who
item.description:
@raped_by_who wrote:

Im guessing you’re using Delta?

Its much easier just to use a GOOD source, that alreaddy has NPC attributes like strength, defence, etc, built in 100%

Delta requires a lot of work in that area.

Read full topic
